MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 and EH7 postcode areas of Edinburgh affecting properties in Easter Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.17am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to make a permanent repair to a faulty underground cable at the corner of Drum Terrace and Easter Road. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.30pm on Tuesday 2nd February 2021.
